meanings.definition: To change the format or structure of something.
meanings.sent1: She reformats her resume to make it look more professional.
meanings.sent2: The software automatically reformats the document for printing.
meanings.sent3: He reformats his messy room to find his lost socks.
meanings.sent4: The artist reformats traditional painting techniques in a modern style.
meanings.sent5: The teacher reformats the lesson plan to engage students better.

meanings.definition: To make changes to improve or update something.
meanings.sent1: The company reformats its website to attract more customers.
meanings.sent2: She reformats the presentation to include the latest data.
meanings.sent3: He reformats his diet to include more vegetables and fruits.
meanings.sent4: The team reformats their strategy to adapt to the new market trends.
meanings.sent5: The chef reformats the menu to offer healthier options.
